page.title: 12BURTON SALMON SCHOOL LIFE 2
page.content: After I get up I make my bed and get dressed. I go downstairs have some cornflakes and then I feed the fish. I then go upstairs and get a good wash and clean my teeth. Then I get my coat and bag. I set off for school with my sister Tina. When we get to the Lollipop Lady we meet some friends and walk to school with them. At the school gate we wait until the bell has gone then we go in. We begin with some sort of maths then we go on to something like History or English until playtime.At playtime I play tennis with a friend in the playground. After playtime we do sewing or Beta work. Some children go home for dinner because of a Teacher's dispute.
